20110123190445.000|20110123190446.000|CC1|PRIVATE SECTOR.

20110123190456.000|20110123190459.000|CC1|IS PART OF WHAT YOU SAID.

20110123190527.000|20110123190530.000|CC1|MINUTE AND LOOK AT SORT OF THE  
20110123190530.000|20110123190532.000|CC1|WHOLE SORT OF CONTINUUM OF THIS 
20110123190532.000|20110123190533.000|CC1|SPENDING CHALLENGES.            
20110123190533.000|20110123190534.000|CC1|WE'LL HAVE THREE BITES AT THE   
20110123190534.000|20110123190535.000|CC1|APPLE HERE AS FAR AS

20110123190537.000|20110123190539.000|CC1|IN THE SIZE OF WASHINGTON.      
20110123190539.000|20110123190541.000|CC1|AS FAR AS THE MESS IN THE PAST, 
20110123190541.000|20110123190542.000|CC1|WE'RE GOING TO HAVE THIS DEBT

20110123190543.000|20110123190544.000|CC1|COME.                           
20110123190544.000|20110123190546.000|CC1|THAT IS DEALING WITH THE        
20110123190546.000|20110123190548.000|CC1|SPENDING IN THIS TOWN THAT'S    
20110123190548.000|20110123190551.000|CC1|GONE OVERDRIVE IN THE LAST      
20110123190551.000|20110123190553.000|CC1|COUPLE YEARS.                   
20110123190553.000|20110123190554.000|CC1|AS FAR AS DECISIONS WE MAKE NOW,
20110123190554.000|20110123190557.000|CC1|IT'S ABOUT CONTINUING RESOLUTION
20110123190557.000|20110123190558.000|CC1|VOTE THAT WILL COME UP IN THE   
20110123190558.000|20110123190604.000|CC1|NEXT MONTH OR SO.               
20110123190604.000|20110123190605.000|CC1|>> 100 BILLION OR NOT 100       
20110123190605.000|20110123190606.000|CC1|BILLION?

20110123190607.000|20110123190608.000|CC1|BILLION IN REDUCTIONS WHICH     
20110123190608.000|20110123190610.000|CC1|BRINGS SPENDING DOWN TO '08

20110123190613.000|20110123190621.000|CC1|POSITION WHERE WE STARTING TO   
20110123190621.000|20110123190621.000|CC1|EVEN DELIBERATE ON THAT FIVE

20110123190622.000|20110123190623.000|CC1|WE ARE INTENT ON MAKING SURE ON 
20110123190623.000|20110123190624.000|CC1|AN ANNUALIZED BASIS THAT WE'RE  
20110123190624.000|20110123190627.000|CC1|HITTING THE '08 LEVELS OR BELOW 
20110123190627.000|20110123190629.000|CC1|AND SO EVERY MEMBER WILL HAVE   
20110123190629.000|20110123190633.000|CC1|THE CHANCE TO COME TO THE FLOOR,

20110123190635.000|20110123190637.000|CC1|BELIEVE THAT '08 LEVELS ARE     
20110123190637.000|20110123190637.000|CC1|ENOUGH TO CUT BECAUSE SOME      
20110123190637.000|20110123190638.000|CC1|MEMBERS ACTUALLY WANT TO SEE US 
20110123190638.000|20110123190639.000|CC1|DO MORE.                        
20110123190639.000|20110123190639.000|CC1|I AGREE.                        
20110123190639.000|20110123190641.000|CC1|WE OUGHT TO LOOK IN EVERY WAY   
20110123190641.000|20110123190642.000|CC1|POSSIBLE TO REDUCE SPENDING AS  
20110123190642.000|20110123190642.000|CC1|MUCH AS POSSIBLE.               
20110123190642.000|20110123190643.000|CC1|>> IT SEEMS LIKE IT'S A         
20110123190643.000|20110123190648.000|CC1|STRAIGHTFORWARD QUESTION.       
20110123190648.000|20110123190650.000|CC1|ARE YOU GOING TO LIVE UP TO THE 
20110123190650.000|20110123190651.000|CC1|$100 BILLION PLEDGE?            
20110123190651.000|20110123190653.000|CC1|I ASSUME YOU PUT A LOT OF       
20110123190653.000|20110123190654.000|CC1|THOUGHT INTO THAT $100 BILLION  
20110123190654.000|20110123190654.000|CC1|FIGURE.                         
20110123190654.000|20110123190655.000|CC1|CAN YOU MAKE IT OR NOT?         
20110123190655.000|20110123190655.000|CC1|>> ABSOLUTELY.                  
20110123190655.000|20110123190656.000|CC1|ON ANNUALIZED BASIS WE'LL CUT   
20110123190656.000|20110123190700.000|CC1|SPENDING $100 BILLION.          
20110123190700.000|20110123190703.000|CC1|>> WILL YOU DO IT THIS YEAR AS  
20110123190703.000|20110123190703.000|CC1|PLEDGED?                        
20110123190703.000|20110123190705.000|CC1|>> ON AN ANNUALIZED --          
20110123190705.000|20110123190705.000|CC1|>> WHICH MEANS WHAT EXACTLY?    
20110123190705.000|20110123190706.000|CC1|>> LOOK WHERE WE ARE.           
20110123190706.000|20110123190707.000|CC1|WE ARE WHERE WE ARE BECAUSE THE 
20110123190707.000|20110123190707.000|CC1|DEMOCRATIC MAJORITY LAST        
20110123190707.000|20110123190708.000|CC1|CONGRESS DIDN'T PASS A BUDGET,  
20110123190708.000|20110123190708.000|CC1|RIGHT?                          
20110123190708.000|20110123190709.000|CC1|THEY DIDN'T DO IT.

20110123195717.000|20110123195718.000|CC1|WE REMEMBER ROBERT SARGENT      
20110123195718.000|20110123195723.000|CC1|SHRIVER MARRIED 56 YEARS TO THE 
20110123195723.000|20110123195725.000|CC1|LOVE OF HIS LIFE, THE LATE      
20110123195725.000|20110123195725.000|CC1|EUNICE KENNEDY SHRIVER.         
20110123195725.000|20110123195726.000|CC1|HE PASSED AWAY THIS WEEK AT THE 
20110123195726.000|20110123195727.000|CC1|AGE OF 95.                      
20110123195727.000|20110123195728.000|CC1|A TOWERING FIGURE IN POLITICS   
20110123195728.000|20110123195730.000|CC1|AND CIVIL SERVICE, SHRIVER      
20110123195730.000|20110123195732.000|CC1|APPEARED ON THIS PROGRAM TEN    
20110123195732.000|20110123195736.000|CC1|TIMES THROUGHOUT HIS CAREER.    
20110123195736.000|20110123195737.000|CC1|IT WAS SPENT IN SERVICE TO HIS  
20110123195737.000|20110123195737.000|CC1|COUNTRY.                        
20110123195737.000|20110123195740.000|CC1|KNOWN AS THE DRIVING FORCE      
20110123195740.000|20110123195743.000|CC1|BEHIND THE PEACE CORPS, HE      
20110123195743.000|20110123195748.000|CC1|SERVED AS ITS FIRST DIRECTOR    
20110123195748.000|20110123195750.000|CC1|UNDER HIS BROTHER-IN-LAW,       
20110123195750.000|20110123195752.000|CC1|PRESIDENT JOHN F. KENNEDY, AND  
20110123195752.000|20110123195756.000|CC1|MADE THE FIRST APPEARANCE HERE  
20110123195756.000|20110123195757.000|CC1|IN 1961.                        
20110123195757.000|20110123195801.000|CC1|>> IN THE SPIRIT OF VOLUNTEER   
20110123195801.000|20110123195801.000|CC1|DOING SOMETHING FOR YOUR COUNTRY
20110123195801.000|20110123195802.000|CC1|PATRIOTIC.                      
20110123195802.000|20110123195803.000|CC1|>> AFTER SERVING ON THE         
20110123195803.000|20110123195803.000|CC1|PRESIDENTIAL TICKET IN 1972,    
20110123195803.000|20110123195804.000|CC1|SHRIVER MADE HIS OWN RUN FOR THE
20110123195804.000|20110123195805.000|CC1|PRESIDENCY AND STOPPED HERE THE 
20110123195805.000|20110123195810.000|CC1|DAY AFTER ANNOUNCING HIS BID ON 
20110123195810.000|20110123195813.000|CC1|SEPTEMBER 21, 1975.             
20110123195813.000|20110123195817.000|CC1|>> MR. SHRIVER, WE'VE BEEN      
20110123195817.000|20110123195820.000|CC1|TALKING TODAY A GREAT DEAL ABOUT
20110123195820.000|20110123195820.000|CC1|THE KENNEDY LEGACY.             
20110123195820.000|20110123195821.000|CC1|JUST WHAT IS THE KENNEDY LEGACY?
20110123195821.000|20110123195822.000|CC1|>> FIRST OF ALL, LET ME SAY THAT
20110123195822.000|20110123195822.000|CC1|I THINK IT'S A LEGACY OF WHICH  
20110123195822.000|20110123195823.000|CC1|ALL AMERICANS CAN BE PROUD OF.  
20110123195823.000|20110123195824.000|CC1|I THINK IT'S A LEGACY WHICH MAY 
20110123195824.000|20110123195825.000|CC1|AT THAT TIME INDICATE THAT      
20110123195825.000|20110123195826.000|CC1|PEOPLE ALL OVER THE WORLD       
20110123195826.000|20110123195827.000|CC1|RESPECTED THIS NATION AND THERE 
20110123195827.000|20110123195828.000|CC1|WAS AN AFFECTION AND BELIEF IN  
20110123195828.000|20110123195830.000|CC1|WHAT WE STOOD FOR.

20110123195831.000|20110123195832.000|CC1|THAT TIME THAT WE COULD SOLVE   
20110123195832.000|20110123195835.000|CC1|OUR PROBLEMS.                   
20110123195835.000|20110123195836.000|CC1|THAT WE WERE NOT HELPLESS.

20110123195838.000|20110123195839.000|CC1|AND SINCE THEN THERE'S BEEN THIS
20110123195839.000|20110123195842.000|CC1|DEVELOPMENT OF DIVISIVENESS IN  
20110123195842.000|20110123195843.000|CC1|OUR SOCIETY, WATERGATE,         
20110123195843.000|20110123195845.000|CC1|ASSASSINATIONS, THE WAR, THE    
20110123195845.000|20110123195846.000|CC1|RECESSION, SO THE PEOPLE HAVE   
20110123195846.000|20110123195849.000|CC1|LOST CONFIDENCE.

20110123195854.000|20110123195858.000|CC1|>> INDEED HE WAS.
